title: Cannot paste unless window is focused via mouseclick
body:
#### Info

Hyper.app version: **0.8.2**
OS: **OSX 10.11.5** _(El Capitan)_
#### Steps to reproduce
1. Blur focus to the Hyper.app window
2. Copy something to your clipboard
3. Tab into Hyper.app
4. Paste

_Additionally:_
Click into Hyper.app after these steps and then try pasting again and it works.
author: timothyis

comments.body: I'm on Hyper 0.8.1 on El Capitan 10.11.3 and this works perfectly fine for me

Same issue here with Mac OS Sierra.

I see this issue as well. It will actually start again if I type anything in between clicking on the window and paste. For example: `click on window, paste` works, but `click on window, type 'x', paste` fails. Also Mac OS Sierra.
Same as @deanputney on Hyper 0.8.3.873 on OS X 10.12.1 (Sierra)
